1.title: UP, CLOSE & PERSONAL: Pritan Ambroase on Bambi being the scariest movie and taking risks
1.plot: In this Hollywood Insider PERSPECTIVES Series, Pritan Ambroase is asked a series of random impromptu questions. Ambroase answers on the spot.

2.title: Are the Oscars Against Talented Female Directors?
2.plot: For Oscars 2019, no female directors were nominated for the Best Director category, even though multiple amazing movies were directed by female directors. When will the industry and Academy get to a point where talent is awarded based on merit and not dismissed based on their gender or sex?

1.title: Make Yourself Great Again - Ban These Toxic Words That Damaged Our World
1.plot: By removing these toxic words, each and everyone of us can achieve success, greatness and an extraordinary life.

2.title: UP, CLOSE & PERSONAL: Pritan Ambroase on Martin Scorsese, Global Warming & why Loyalty is sexy
2.plot: In this Hollywood Insider PERSPECTIVES Series, Pritan Ambroase is asked a series of random impromptu questions. Ambroase answers on the spot.

3.title: #metoo Revolution: Powerful Questions That Need Answers
3.plot: These powerful questions have been written by the host Pritan Ambroase. Instead of forcing his answers on people, the host wanted to place questions in front of the viewers that makes them think and take action.

4.title: Zero Tolerance Policy is Zero Humanity Policy
4.plot: A compilation of various current news alongside film scenes depicting previous cruel practices.

5.title: UP, CLOSE & PERSONAL: Pritan Ambroase on Marion Cotillard, Hanks, Religion & Uber Drivers
5.plot: In this Hollywood Insider PERSPECTIVES Series, Pritan Ambroase is asked a series of random impromptu questions. Ambroase answers on the spot.

6.title: MESSAGES FROM AMERICA: What is your message to the refugees?
6.plot: Hollywood Insider's MESSAGES FROM AMERICA series, created by the Editor-in-Chief Pritan Ambroase, hopes to show to the world what civilian Americans and visitors in America have to say. Usually, the world only knows the words and actions of US POLITICIANS, but seldom see what the people in America truly think about political issues. Other countries see only one side, without knowing that not all Americans agree with their politicians. This series aims to show what the rest of America, the people in America truly feel.

7.title: MESSAGES FROM AMERICA: Should Religion Be Utilized To Govern America?
7.plot: Everyday Americans and visitors answer questions on current issues. This series provides a platform for everyone to have a say on issues that matter most.
